<Heading
  as={"h1"}

  children={"Get Block by Height or Hash"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/{network}/block/{heightOrHash}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the latest block from the Aleo blockchain via the block's height or blockhash.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"network","in":"path","description":"The network (mainnet or testnet)","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["mainnet","testnet"]}},{"name":"heightOrHash","in":"path","description":"Block height (integer) or block hash (string)","required":true,"schema":{"oneOf":[{"type":"integer"},{"type":"string"}]}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
